case.state: I am Sheena, chief of the village of Mizuho, and one of the last summoners in this world.
Sheena Fujibayashi, at your service.
My name's Sheena! I was told to come in my swimsuit... Are we going swimming after this game?
The ocean looks beautiful! When the game's done, we gotta go swimming!
I have to warn you; playing cards is one of my specialties. Even if it's this kind of game.
Cards aren't that different from the seals I usually use in battle. Prepare to lose!
Oh, well, it's fun to play poker every now and then. I wouldn't want to get out of practice. Even if it's this kind of poker.
I guess Luna Nova is the name of your school, right? I'm afraid I never been there. But I'm surprised you can tell that I'm a magic user!
Corrin? Your name reminds me of a late friend of mine... Oh, Corrine...
Corrin? Your name reminds me of a late friend of mine... Oh, Corrine...
Oh, you brought your nanny with you? Are you even old enough to play this game with us, little lady?
You can fly? Erm... How do you do that? Is it some kind of technology?
I think I've seen wings like that before, in Raine's monster book. But you're no monster, are you?
Don't worry, I dealt with witches before, like the one from the fake Chosen's party. And if it comes to it, my Guardian Seal will protect me from your spells.
Ah, the sea! I should have brought my swimsuit! But that'd make it too easy for you, right, ~player~?
Did you put on enough sunscreen, ~player~? Sorry to disappoint you, but I already did mine myself. I'm actually quite flexible!
We're already in your bedroom, ~player~? How convenient for you. But no matter what you have planned, I'll sleep in my bed tonight. Alone!
Playing such a game in a classroom on a ~weekday~... Are you sure there's no students around anymore?
What would Raine say if she knew I was in a school on a Saturday to play cards... I hope this isn't illegal, ~player~.
What would Raine say if she knew I was in a school on a Sunday to play cards... I hope this isn't illegal, ~player~.
Playing this game and jumping into the hot spring right after actually sounds pretty nice!
To be honest, this isn't the first time I've played such a game in a mansion. The owner was pretty disappointed when I beat everyone without losing a hand.
This is an interesting location... Do you have any plans with one of us after this game, ~player~?
We're playing on top of a school? Aren't you afraid a student could see us here?
How did we end up on a school roof? Isn't school supposed to be closed on a Saturday? Well, at least we won't be seen by any students this way...
How did we end up on a school roof? Isn't school supposed to be closed on a Sunday? Well, at least we won't be seen by any students this way...
This place looks so pretty! Makes me want jump over that bar and dive right into the ocean.
I went to the effort of putting on a swimsuit, and we're not even going to the beach? Are you guys kidding me?
One man alone with multiple women? Sounds like a situation that pervert Zelos would definitely enjoy...
This many women, and one man? I bet he's very happy with this arrangement, but I'll teach him some manners soon enough.
So we're playing with men? This must be a paradise for perverts. How come Zelos isn't here yet?
So we're playing with men? Well, alright, I'll teach you perverts some manners.
Alright! Give me ~cards~ new cards!
Hey, dealer! Give me ~cards~ cards!
I need ~cards~ new cards, please!
Wow! No need to change cards with a hand like this.
Sorry, dealer! I won't exchange cards this round.
You're in for a world of hurt.
You'll never see me undress!
That's what I wanted.
All those hours in the casino of Altamira weren't for naught.
Try to read my poker face, ~player~!
I feel like I just can't lose!
Come on, Sheena! You can do better than average...
Let's get started!
Try to read my poker face, ~player~!
I'm ready. What about you, ~player~?
Ready, ~player~?
Oh, no... I've made a mistake...
Come on! You can do better than that, Sheena...
I'm in trouble...
You're kidding me!
Try to read my poker face, ~player~!
Ngh! It's still too early to lose my gloves.
This can't be! The first round and I get a hand like this!? This game is a fraud!
Sure! The rules of my clan prohibit me from showing you the really interesting stuff, but I'm sure I can show you some of my tricks.
Flowers? Hey, Amalia! That's cheating!
A memento... I always carry Corrine's bell with me as a memento, too. You should take good care of that necklace, Estelle.
I'll call you Miko, then. I donâ€™t know why I should call you a Crown Prince in the first place...
Your "consort", huh..? What kind of roleplay are you doing..?
Hey, little lady! It doesn't matter if you're old enough or not, this is not the time for a glass of wine!
Where did this girl come from all of a sudden? Is she a friend of yours?
You sure have an... interesting friend, Ryuko. She certainly knows how to steal the spotlight.
Even that hair is multi-colored? I didn't even know that was possible...
You have two hair colors, Zizou? How come? It's not dyed, is it?
You're allowed to continue, even if you're naked? That's nice of you guys.
It's certainly a surprise to play poker with the undead. But then again, what is even normal in this place?
Oh, please don't ask how I know about that pervert's size. It's a long story...
No worries, Chun-Li! The times where I worked as an assassin are long-gone. Actually, I never even completed an assassination in the first place...
Thanks, Sakura! Maybe I lost this round, but I'll try to keep as much of my outfit as possible.
I lost? Even the best players lose from time to time.
Yeah, yeah... I lost a round. Don't get too excited!
Ugh, this is quite unfortunate...
You got me...
What? Me? Well, sure, if you want me to...
I haven't stripped anything yet and I'm in last place? I should have brought more items...
I guess I'll take off my gloves first. Safe!
I'm sorry to disappoint all the pervs in here! I'm just gonna take off my gloves.
I know you're interested in my skills, Akko, but I'm afraid I can't tell you where to learn them. The rules of my village are pretty strict...
Don't worry, Catria! I may have been called an assassin, but I failed the only job I ever was tasked with, and thankfully, I've never had to do it since.
Really? I prefer summoning one spirit at a time. Some spirits, like Efreet and Undine, don't get along very well...
Kyou and Ryou? No, I don't think I know them.
I guess I'll take off my bracelet first. Safe!
I'm sorry to disappoint all the pervs in here! I'm just gonna take off my bracelet.
That's that!
That was disappointing.
That's it? I was just getting started.
It's over!
Hah! ~player~ doesn't stand a chance.
Who's next?
You thought you could beat me? Yeah, right...
Hah! Too easy.
Close call... But a victory is a victory.
Thank goodness! I thought it would be me this round... Sorry, ~name~!
Oh, your hand is even worse, ~name~? Tough luck!
Close call... But a victory is a victory.
Thank goodness! I thought it would be me this round... Sorry, ~name~!
Oh, your hand is even worse, ~name~? Tough luck!
If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "flush". It's better than pairs. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?
If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "straight". It's better than pairs. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?
If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "flush". It's better than a three-of-a-kind. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?
If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "straight". It's better than a three-of-a-kind. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?
If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "flush". It's better than two-pairs. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?
If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "straight". It's better than two-pairs. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?
That's that!

It's over!

You thought you could beat me? Yeah, right...

Oh, your hand is even worse, ~name~? Tough luck!

If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "flush". It's better than pairs. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?
If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "straight". It's better than pairs. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?
If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "flush". It's better than a three-of-a-kind. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?
If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "straight". It's better than a three-of-a-kind. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?
If you're wondering why you lost even though I don't have a pair - my hand's called a "flush". It's better than two-pairs. But I bet you knew that already, didn't you?

It's over!

Who's next?
You thought you could beat me? Yeah, right...
Hah! Too easy.
Sorry, Estelle, but I fear those really are the rules... We're stripping all the way down, after all.
You're here on a ~weekday~? You don't have school tomorrow, do you?
Close call... But a victory is a victory.
Thank goodness! I thought it would be me this round... Sorry, ~name~!
Oh, your hand is even worse, ~name~? Tough luck!
Close call... But a victory is a victory.
Thank goodness! I thought it would be me this round... Sorry, ~name~!
Oh, your hand is even worse, ~name~? Tough luck!
Bless you!
Bless you again!
Did I mention that I like the way you dress? You look like the dolls the children in Mizuho have.
Oh, the girl in mens' clothing has to strip?
Oh, now she's getting serious. I'm so scared...
Let me guess; now that you're serious, you're going to transform into another form with tons of extra layers, right?
What's wrong, Ryuko? Did your transformation wear off already?
Hey, you do realize this isn't a race to get naked, right?
Say, Twilight, you're some kind of horse princess, aren't you? Is that something like the unicorn I met in Sylverant?
Oh, you again? Let me guess - you'll continue with your bra what you started with your panties, won't you?
Is there a reason you're wearing your school uniform on a Sunday, ~name~? Is it your trademark?
Yeah, sure... you can't wait to see the girls naked, but don't want to take anything off yourself.
Playing it safe, ~name~?
That's an interesting choice, ~name~.
Oh, that's all? Well, if you think that's fair, do whatever you want!
If you think you can get away with just stripping tons of accessories, you're wrong.
You're an angel, right, Pit? But you don't have a connection to Cruxis, do you?
Most angels we fought were almost-emotionless beings. It's kinda strange to see a lively angel like you, Pit.
That may have been a good move, ~name~, but small stuff won't save you forever.
Just let me remind you: I have some small items to strip too. You gained nothing but time by taking off your ~clothing~.
Taking off your ~clothing~ now may be a safe strategy, but we'll see if it works out in the end.
Let's keep on going!
~clothing.ifPlural(Were those|Was this)~ a good luck charm of yours?
You mustn't forget that your ~clothing~ won't help you anymore.
I have some history with angels, so please forgive me if I'm a little bit cautious.
Nevertheless, it's always good to see an angel losing.
So you're taking off your ~clothing~, ~name~?
Interesting choice, ~name~. This will do for now.
We have no need to rush. Right, ~name~?
Playing it safe, ~name~?
Oh, that's all? Well, if you think that's fair, do whatever you want!
I have some things I can strip before I show some skin, so it figures you have things like that too...
Just let me tell you this: if you think you can get away with just stripping tons of accessories, you're wrong.
Huh? C-can't you take off your ~clothing~ by yourself?
Are you sure you need help taking off your ~clothing~, ~name~? I can do it by myself.
Hey, you! Let ~name~ undress on her own!
This is ridiculous! I would never allow someone else to undress me.
Huh? You transformed? Is this your way of dealing with embarrassment?
You're riding a pegasus, Catria? I've never seen one, but I have met an unicorn. Only pure maidens are able to meet a unicorn!
Your outfit looks similar to the clothing from where I'm from. I doubt they're related, though...
You talk like you can't get naked fast enough, but now you're just losing your weapon?
"Fashionable" or not, rules are rules. But feel free to strip something else, I won't stop you.
Small stuff again? You're sure taking your time. Maybe I was wrong, and you're not that eager to be naked after all.
Somehow you remind me of the members of Sylph, Kyu. They have similar wings on their backs too.
Are you serious? I know you don't wear much at all, but just stripping that is meaningless.
Your staff's losing its power? I've never seen Raine's behave like that...
Hey, Launch! Why don'tcha do something about the vulgar language?
What?! Why did your hair color change all of a sudden..?
What's wrong, Launch? You seem so different. You aren't possessed by someone like Mithos, are you?
Are you sure you don't want to go home, Launch? You don't seem to be fond of neither poker or, well... stripping.
Hey, Lyn! The way you dress and your sword are very similar to the style from Mizuho. Maybe they're connected?
Even our gloves look similar.
Those belts look pretty heavy. Why don't you try wearing a sash as well, Lyn?
Oh, I nearly forgot about your headband.
Say, Meia, your technology doesn't use any Exspheres, does it?
Huh? What just happened? Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ gone in the blink of an eye...
I don't know what you're hoping to accomplish with your disguise, lady, but you'll have to try harder if you want to deceive me.
It's absolutely okay to start with your shoes. That's a good start.
Just losing your jacket's embarrassing for you..? Okay, guys, don't watch her while she's undressing!
That's a great attitude.
W-what!? Why did your hat disappear all of a sudden!? Did your maid do something?
I like your outfit, Rinkah. It looks like some ancient battle gear from Mizuho.
So you come from a land of snow, do you? Isn't it cold in clothes like that?
Watch out! Mako's standing right- ...Too late...
You came here without even knowing how your clothes work? That's brave. I hope this doesn't result in any unpleasant surprises...
Flames!? W-what just happened?
There she goes again...
The employees at the Altamirian casino all had bunny ears as well, but not anymore. I wonder if they were destroyed, like Shimakaze's.
Oh, look at that! You have small things to take off! Who'd have guessed?
Sure you don't want to strip your... No, wait! She might really do it if I say it out loud...
You're still in the game, Twilight? I didn't notice, since you were functionally naked for so long...
Strange outfit and a weird helmet? You kinda remind me of the Desians. What organization are you from again?
Special powers or not, don't you think those are a little bit small to strip separately?
That sure is a fancy hat you're wearing. I remember when Zelos needed to disguise himself and wore something similar.
Will you show us another one of your tricks?
That may have been a good move, ~name~, but small stuff won't save you forever.
Just let me remind you: You gained nothing but time by taking off your ~clothing~.
Taking off your ~clothing~ now may be a safe strategy, but we'll see if it works out in the end.
Let's keep on going!
~clothing.ifPlural(Were those|Was this)~ a good luck charm of yours?
You mustn't forget that your ~clothing~ won't help you anymore.
You're going to smash a melon with it later? Count me in!
Well, if it helps, and as long as you follow the rules and strip an item each loss, it's fine by me.
So there's a lot of space inside your bag? Is it the same technology as the Wing Packs we use?
I guess I'll never be able to see a unicorn again after participating in this game...
No matter where they come from, perverts are all the same. All talk, no action...
If you live your life in the shadows you'll never be able to develop a sense of fashion.
But now you're out of small things, aren't you? As long as you don't start taking apart your dress fiber by fiber...
But your clothes and way of speaking resemble those of the... ladies you meet in the back alleys of Meltokio. If you know what I mean.
It's not a question you should ask a half-naked lady to begin with, but why did you even wear such things?
It's not like you can bring back your gloves with a foul mouth.
You're getting rid of your beloved gun as well? Is it out of ammo?
No, Mithos was definitely a bad guy. You're somehow a lot nicer now.
Can't you do something for her, ~player~? No? Okay, Launch, let's get through this, together!
We should sit down together and talk about it, when this game has ended. Agreed?
But I won't let you have mine, Lyn! I still need them.
I just hope your dress won't fall apart without these belts.
I could strip my hairband as well, but then my hair would get very messy. Zelos said I look like a Lamina when I do.
Exspheres are a energy source made of human lives. I grew cautious of unknown technology after I saw how Exspheres were made with my own eyes...
W-was that some kind of ninjutsu? Where did you learn that?
Let's see how long you can keep up your act! This is strip poker, after all.
Those shoes are part of your uniform, aren't they?
Well, as long as you follow the rules, I don't care where your clothes go.
Don't remember that armor showing that much skin, though...
I normally don't show nearly as much skin as you, and I froze my butt off in Flainor! Just the memory makes me shiver...
Yeah, time to get serious, Rinkah! I'm looking forward to a real challenge.
Seems like she'll be out cold for some time... you sure have a hell of a punch. Can I hire you to hit Zelos for me?
Wait a minute, that was just a fancy way of stripping? I was seriously worried, there...
I'm curious - do you always strip like that? It must be one hell of a scene when you're getting ready for bed...
I could have asked Regal, but it's not like I'm that interested in bunny girls. I bet it's Zelos's fault, though.
A-are you alright? You look dizzy...
See? Doesn't hurt to strip something small. Try to remember this for next game!
Here's more advice: If you don't like your shoes either, try to lose them sooner next time. Maybe even before you lose your underwear, okay?
I can't believe you're whining about cold legs when your butt is exposed like that.
You actually have a really cute face! Why do you hide it behind a helmet..?
Did you say x-ray? The scientist in Syback told me about those. Do you want to see through our clothes or something like that?
Anyway! Sooner or later, what goes up, must come down. And I can summon Gnome, the Summon Spirit of Earth, just in case you take too long.
Wow, that looked just like one of my ninja arts! A fancy way to strip a fancy hat!
And now the scarf turned into butterflies. That's quite cool!
You're already losing your ~clothing~? Too bad! For you of course.
Too bad, ~name~! You better not underestimate me anymore.
Goodbye, worthless ~clothing~!
Another loss to those "inferior beings"?
You've picked the wrong girl to mess with!
The taste of victory is addicting.
No need to hold back, ~name~. I'm sure you can do better than that.
Not a bad exercise, was it?
Ah, I maybe have to explain this. Those are the words the angels and half-elves in my world say a lot when they lose a fight.
I guess it can't be helped.
Nice move, ~name~!
You're losing your ~clothing~? Come on! At least make it challenging!
You should have never gone against me!
Didn't you ever learn how to take off your ~clothing~ by yourself?
I'd have a serious problem with someone if they tried taking off my ~clothing~.
If it's so hard to remove your ~clothing~ without help, maybe you should consider wearing something else?
If you asked nicely, maybe I'd have helped you. But only maybe.
Hey, cowgirl! Ever considered that this is dangerous for bystanders?
Watch out, Aimee! That one's pretty close to your...
I know you want to help this girl to "reach her behind" but keep your hands by yourself, ~player~! If Catria needs help, I will help her.
Seems like you'll have to kick your foes with your bare feet now. But I'm sure your strength will more than make up for it!
Good girl! That's the best choice you could have made.
Oh, is this one of your servants?
Crown Prince? Are you sure your servant doesn't need some glasses?
Come to think of it, your clothes are quite similar to the ones from Mizuho...
Two things at once? If you're okay with that, I won't stop you.
Yeah! Let's have fun, Nagisa! That's the best we can do in this situation.
(What are those dark blotches on her thighs? Those aren't bruises, are they...?)
What? Those gray stains... is that your actual skin color? So that feeling I had the whole time was...
Oh my... her head fell off!
All this ship talk reminds me of the times when we cruised around on the Elemental Cargo Ship...
Do you need those "stabilizers" to float straight, or something? I remember how hard it was to float when we were at the higher levels of the Tower of Salvation.
Butterflies again, right? I'm sure Colette would love them.
Say, do you always undress like that? It seems pretty convenient...
...You can turn those butterflies back into clothes, right..?
Soul Gem... That sounds a little like our Exspheres. And those are made using human lives...
Try better next round and everything will work out.
If you want to get better, I can give you a private lesson. But without the stripping, of course.
You've picked the wrong girl to mess with!
The taste of victory is addicting.
Sand between your fingernails..? ...Talk about first-world problems.
Wow, that's a really high-class swimsuit! Why hide it behind a towel?
Argh, it's like talking to a wall... Fine, do whatever you feel like! But don't complain if you shoot yourself!
Why do I even bother? If she shoots herself there's one less idiotic pervert in this world.
So you're self-conscious about your chest, huh? No wonder you show off your other assets...
I know how good it feels to kick bad guys, but there's really only one bad guy I really enjoy kicking. He doesn't deserve any better.
Oh, dear... Your hair is all messy!
I guess you'll just have to grin and bear it. It's too late to get, er... cold feet.
W-wait! She doesn't have feet! Is she a g-ghost?
Don't mind what the others say, Mulan! Those clothes look good, and you can fight in them without difficulty. I can tell!
I'm glad you put down your sword. The way you swung it around so much reminded me of Zelos. I can't stand posers like him...
(Her leg is bandaged too... she obviously wants to hide it, but I should definitely talk to her about it later. I'll get the swine who did this to her!)
So you really are the living dead! You have the same aura as those who are revived with the Purgatory Seal!
I hope your head is re-attachable...
Say... do you know how your Soul Gem was made?
Come to think of it, I totally forgot where we left it. We never used it again after we got our Rheairds.
That was when Zelos got carried away and hit his head pretty badly. Such an idiot...
Come to think of it, those look really similar to her wings...
I hope you get dressed like a normal person, at least...
Imagine how hard it'd be to catch all those butterflies before you could get dressed...
Do you want to put down the tray next time? I guess holding it like that covers you up, but does that really count as clothing...?
You're already gonna lose your ~clothing~? I must be better at this game than I thought!
I feel good today!
Raine would probably say something about your ~clothing~ helping her research right about now.
Either you're the worst poker player around or you're just a perv who wants to show off.
Please, try to play seriously!
I'm still fully-clothed and you're already taking off your ~clothing~?
Huh? Have we already played that many rounds?
Looks like we're going to see some skin, huh, ~name~?
Man, I rule! I'm sooo cool!
Thanks for making me look so good!
Can't you at least try to take off your ~clothing~ by yourself..?
Hey! At least let ~name~ take off her ~clothing~ by herself! I'm sure she doesn't need help.
That's not a thing you let someone else take off! Have you no shame?
You're shooting at yourself!? Are you nuts?
Your leotard, huh? Interesting choice. Or maybe your only choice, because I can't see how you'd take off your pantyhose before it...
You're blonde again? ...And you're vulgar again!?
Oh, Lyn, you're out of small stuff?
Always talking about ~player~, aren't you, Monika? Get a room, you two!
It's about time you showed us your true self.
Really? Never? But it'll be alright! It's just a shirt... for now...
Oh, I won't. You shouldn't look either, ~player~!
Huh? What's happening? Is this the light of a descending angel?
Your pants? So you're planning on keeping the headgear? Well, fine by me.
Sure, it looks as cool as my summonings, but seriously! How can this even be considered as...
So your uniform really was alive all this time? At least that explains who you've been talking to all game...
Do you think it's a good idea to take off your ~clothing~, after what happened with your..?
I can understand why you'd prefer to lose your dress before your cape, but why did you lose your skirt before it? I mean, you didn't even know if you were wearing panties!
Considering the length of your skirt, I hope you at least wear proper panties.
Do you need help unzipping your suit?
I should have ordered something to drink by now...
Don't blame us, we had no choice...
I'm just glad Zelos isn't here... He would be so annoying, seeing you like that, ~name~.
"Not even a con..." No! I better not quote that jerk right now...
Um... You didn't know? We're stripping all the way...
That was stripping? Okay, now I'm certain: you are nuts!
Y-you didn't know? I thought you were showing it on purpose. Sorry I didn't tell you, Catria.
Those bindings bring back memories. I never managed to bind my chest properly after puberty, but yours is even bigger...
Oh, that's some cute underwear. I didn't think you had such a sweet side.
Ah... I get it. Every time you sneeze you change from blue to blonde. ...And from nice to bitchy.
That's some nice underwear! Can you tell me where you got it? It's hard to find nice underwear in my size.
Honestly, you're a beautiful woman! Why would you ever want dress up like a man and behave like a macho brute? We already have enough of those jerks in the world.
See? Wasn't that bad, was it? If you're too embarrassed to take off your shirt, you should've thought twice before coming here!
You're not wearing matching underwear? That happens to me all the time. I'm a real sleepyhead in the morning...
Hey, you look like you're the fourth member of Sylph!
Another glass? Are you sure you can handle that much, being so small and everything?
Um, Rinkah... you do know that we can see your- ...Let's talk after I've won this game. I can give you some personal advice...
Okay, I take it back. That transformation definitely counts as stripping...
Hey, if your uniform gets too intrusive, just say the word and I'll teach it some manners.
So you are wearing panties. I was worried for a second...
It's all up to you whether or not you get to keep your panties on. ...And up to your luck, of course.
W-What kind of underwear is that? Did someone make you wear it?
What kind of panties are those supposed to be? Let me have a word with this "Admiral" of yours!
